backgrounds.title: 3D Aquarium Backgrounds

neutralChemistry.title: Neutral Water Chemistry
neutralChemistry.description: Won't affect pH, hardness, or release tannins into your water

fishSafe.title: Fish-Safe Materials
fishSafe.description: Non-toxic, won't be picked at or damaged by aggressive species

easyClean.title: Easy to Clean
easyClean.description: Algae scrubs off easily - safe to use plastic brushes

unlimited.title: Unlimited Lifespan
unlimited.description: Unlike natural materials, these never decay, rot, or need replacement

usTariffNotice.title: We're Here for You

customOnlyBanner.description: This model can only be ordered in custom dimensions to fit your exact aquarium specifications.

lifetimeWarranty.description: Chemical-resistant materials that never leach or affect water chemistry
